name: The Classroom (adzl)
description:
Transported back to his primary classroom Gary meets up with Jon and Tim, two deceased former classmates.
Help Gary find out why he's there.

The game was written in Unity3D and contains only original music and graphics by me.

For the graphics I used Blender to create the classroom and MakeHuman to create the characters. The music was written using Ableton Live lite. The voices were provided by Amazon Polly
